scripts.coverage:local: node --harmony_default_parameters node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover --config=istanbul.json _mocha -- --reporter min test.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.coverage:publish: node --harmony_default_parameters node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover --config=istanbul.json _mocha -- --reporter min test.js && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.postversion: git push origin master --tags && npm publish ./
